name: Dungeon Gaem(Game jam Version)
description:
My entry for the MyFirstGameJam:Summer 2021,its  not really that good so dont expect anything crazy here, but i did have alot of fun :)

You can dash through enemies and shoot and there is like random dungeon generation. We got it all dude (i have no idea what im writing)

Thanks to these for these three people for hosting the jam: J, Adrienne Lombardo, lysander

Controlls:WASD to move or the arrow keys,left mouse click to shoot,spacebar to dash,e to open chest/equip weapons,q to swap weapons.

Suggestion is open for some new mechanics and name for the game.And if you find any bugs just comment it and i will try to fix it.

music was not made by me. i used this free soundtrack thing:https://tallbeard.itch.io/three-red-hearts-prepare-to-dev

the font i used(only works for unity btw):Free Pixel Font - Thaleah | 2D Fonts | Unity Asset Store
